title: CritiqueResult
description: Structured output from Codex critique (PLAN_GATE or CODE_GATE)

confidence.description: Confidence score 0-100. Must be justified in feedback.

approved.description: Whether the artifact (plan or code) is approved

blockers.description: Blocking issues that MUST be resolved before approval

feedback.description: Detailed feedback explaining the confidence score and assessment

before.description: Current state (for modify/remove). Empty string if not applicable.

after.description: Desired state (for add/modify). Empty string if not applicable.

diff_instructions.description: Specific changes needed with location and before/after

clarity_single_intent.description: Is the outcome aligned with the plan's single intent?

smallest_vertical_slice.description: Did implementation stay minimal without scope creep?

apple_native_ux.description: Are all user-visible states native and matching patterns?

single_source_of_truth.description: Does implementation preserve single canonical source of truth?

simplicity_subtraction.description: Is code simpler than alternatives, avoiding over-engineering?

edge_cases_failure_modes.description: Are edge cases handled and do failures degrade gracefully?

testability_rollout_safety.description: Are tests concrete, can this be rolled out and back safely?

consistency_with_patterns.description: Does code match repo's architecture, naming, conventions?

rubric_breakdown.description: Breakdown of scores across 8 rubric categories
